remarks: A definition of a continuous function using closed sets.  Theorem 1 (d) of [BourbakiTop1] p.  I.9.  (Contributed by FL, 19-Nov-2006.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)
statement:
iscncl $p |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ K e. ( TopOn ` Y ) ) -> ( F e. ( J Cn K ) <-> ( F : X --> Y /\ A. y e. ( Clsd ` K ) ( `' F " y ) e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) ) ) $.
$d F y $.
$d J y $.
$d K y $.
$d X y $.
$d Y y $.
